* Mentor in the New York Academy of Sciences' 1000 girls, 1000 futures mentoring program (2018-2019)
    - Corresponding AmStat News [article](http://magazine.amstat.org/blog/2018/11/01/1000-girls-1000-futures/?utm_source=informz&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=amstatnews&_zs=UvcOe1&_zl=vBfH5)
